title: Runtime Semantics: Evaluation
intro: JS2IL lowers runtime evaluation semantics for the supported JavaScript subset through its HIR/LIR/IL pipeline; unsupported grammar and early-error cases are rejected in parse/validation stages.

entries.feature: Runtime evaluation lowering for supported statements and expressions
entries.notes: Evaluation is implemented for the supported syntax subset via HIR parsing and LIR/IL lowering, not as a full coverage implementation of every grammar production in ECMA-262.
